item.title: Stock with Data Science -- Part 1
item.description: import pandas as pd from requests_html import HTMLSession import re import time import os import numpy as np curDir=os.getcwd() Fetch a list of industry stock ticker from etnet use requests-html package to get the html contents > example of oil industry The absolute links with this https://www.etnet.com.hk/realtime/quote.php\?code=(.*) can extract the tickers session = HTMLSession() oil='ONG' hotel='HNE' #Parameter industry=oil r = session.get('https://www.etnet.com.hk/www/eng/stocks/industry_detail.php?nature={}&subtype=all'.format(oil)) pattern = re.
